headline: J.D. Vance: It’s Ridiculous that Biological Males Can Compete with Biological Females in Sports
sentences: My wife just had our first girl three months ago and it’s — I kind of think it’s really sad to think that she would work her entire life and have woke agendas from the Democratic Party take away her achievements and take away her sense that she’s accomplished something.”

‘It’s really sad to think that she will work her entire life and have woke agenda from the Democratic Party take away her achievements’
EXCERPT:
VANCE: "Yeah, so, look, clearly there should be a federal change.
It’s ridiculous that biological males are competing with biological females and sports.
And I say this is the father of a baby girl.
